title: Junior Backend Engineer
description:
About the Role:
Careem is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join our Super App team. You will be responsible for building high-scale microservices that power millions of rides and orders daily.

Key Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable RESTful APIs using Python (FastAPI/Django).
- Optimize database performance (PostgreSQL, Redis).
- Work with asynchronous task queues (Celery/RabbitMQ).
- Collaborate with mobile and frontend teams.
- Ensure high availability and reliability of services.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of experience in backend development.
- Expert in Python, FastAPI, and SQL.
- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS.
- Strong understanding of distributed systems and microservices.
- Experience with Event-Driven Architecture (Kafka) is a plus.

title: Mid-Level Frontend Engineer
description:
Join Talabat, the leading food delivery platform in the MENA region. We are scaling our tech team and looking for a Full Stack Developer to build delightful user experiences.

What you will do:
- Develop responsive web applications using React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
- Build robust backend services with Node.js and Express.
- Integrate with third-party APIs (Maps, Payments).
- Write clean, testable code (Jest, Cypress).

What we look for:
- 3+ years of full stack experience.
- Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript, React, and Node.js.
- Experience with MongoDB and PostgreSQL.
- Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions).
- Passion for UI/UX and performance optimization.

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
description:
Noon IT is seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and deployment pipelines.

Responsibilities:
- Manage AWS infrastructure using Terraform (IaC).
- Automate deployment workflows using Jenkins and GitLab CI.
- Monitor system health using Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK Stack.
- Ensure security best practices in cloud environments.
- Manage Kubernetes clusters (EKS).

Qualifications:
- 4+ years of DevOps/SRE experience.
- Strong AWS knowledge (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, VPC).
- Proficiency in Linux scripting (Bash/Python).
- Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes.
- Certified AWS Solutions Architect is preferred.

title: Lead DevOps Engineer
description:
Emirates Group is at the forefront of AI innovation. We are looking for an AI Engineer to build Large Language Model (LLM) applications.

Role:
- Fine-tune and deploy LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral) for enterprise use cases.
- Build RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipelines using LangChain and Vector Databases (Pinecone/Milvus).
- Optimize model inference latency.
- Work with data scientists to productize ML models.

Stack:
- Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow.
- HuggingFace Transformers, LangChain.
- Docker, FastAPI for model serving.
- Cloud: Azure / AWS.

Requirements:
- Masters in CS/AI or equivalent experience.
- 3+ years in Machine Learning engineering.
- Experience with NLP and Generative AI.

title: Staff Data Engineer
description:
Tabby is the Middle East's homegrown online marketplace. We are looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer to lead our consumer-facing web team.

Responsibilities:
- Architect and build scalable frontend applications using Next.js.
- Optimize Core Web Vitals and SEO performance.
- Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews.
- Collaborate with designers on the Design System.

Tech Stack:
- React, Next.js, Redux/Zustand.
- SCSS / Tailwind / Styled Components.
- Webpack / Vite.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of frontend development.
- Deep understanding of DOM, CSS, and JS runtime.
- Experience with high-traffic e-commerce sites.

title: Principal AI/ML Engineer
description:
G42 is revolutionizing shopping in MENA. We need a Product Manager to drive our 'Shop Now Pay Later' product.

Role:
- Define product roadmap and strategy.
- Work with engineering and design to deliver features.
- Analyze user data to make informed decisions.
- Manage stakeholder expectations.

Requirements:
- 4+ years of Product Management experience in Fintech.
- Strong analytical skills (SQL, Amplitude).
- Experience with Agile/Scrum.
- Excellent communication skills.

title: Junior Product Manager
description:
Protect critical infrastructure from cyber threats. Monitor SOC alerts, conduct vulnerability assessments, and respond to incidents.

Skills:
- SIEM (Splunk, QRadar).
- Network Security (Firewalls, IDS/IPS).
- Penetration Testing tools (Metasploit, Burp Suite).
- Incident Response frameworks (NIST).

Certifications:
- CISSP, CEH, or OSCP preferred.

title: Mid-Level Security Engineer
description:
PropertyFinder is the world's leading cloud kitchen platform. We handle massive amounts of food order data.

Role:
- Build scalable data pipelines (ETL/ELT) using Airflow and dbt.
- Manage Data Warehouse (Snowflake / BigQuery).
- Implement real-time data streaming with Kafka.
- Ensure data quality and governance.

Tech:
- Python, SQL (Advanced).
- Spark, Kafka, Airflow.
- AWS/GCP data services.

title: Senior Backend Engineer
description:
Dubizzle is the leading classifieds platform. We are rewriting our core services in Python.

Role:
- Rewrite legacy PHP monoliths into Python Microservices.
- Maintain high code quality and test coverage.
- Work with PostgreSQL and Elasticsearch.

Requirements:
- 3+ years in Python (Django/Flask/FastAPI).
- Experience with REST APIs and GraphQL.
- Familiarity with search engines (Elasticsearch/Solr).

title: Lead Frontend Engineer
description:
Lead the technical direction for DarkMatter's search experience.

Role:
- Design high-availability systems.
- Solve complex distributed system problems.
- Mentor senior engineers.
- Drive technical strategy.

Requirements:
- 10+ years of software engineering.
- Proven track record of designing systems at scale.
- Polyglot (Go, Python, PHP, or Java).
- Deep database knowledge.
